cards.title: Breach Mage
setup: Put two {ABreachI} into play with 0 and 1 tokens in their Focus Pools.
Put two {ABreachIII} into play with 2 and 3 tokens in their Focus Pools.
gameplay: At the start of your turn, you may activate a [u]Cast[/u] text on each of your Spells and destroy those spells.
powers: Destroy 1 of your Charge cards. If you do, any player draws 2 cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: I don't know how I got here, but I know this must be stopped.

cards.title: Stable Breach
body: This card is Indestructible.
1 Spell may be next to this card at a time.
powers: Remove 1 token from this card's Focus Pool. If no token was removed this way, you may play up to 3 Spells.

cards.title: Cycle of Magic
body: Draw 2 cards.
Activate a card's [u]Cast[/u] text, then place that card on top of its deck.
